sections.title: Read the text
sections.text: This is Mark. He is 10 years old. He lives in a small town with his mother, father, and sister. Mark goes to Green Hill School. His favorite subject is Math. After school, he plays football with his friends. On weekends, he likes to ride his bike and watch cartoons.

sections.title: True or False
items: On weekends, he rides his bike.

sections.title: Answer the questions
questions: What does Mark do after school?
What does he like to do on weekends?
answers: He lives in a small town.
He plays football with his friends.
He likes to ride his bike and watch cartoons.
